fields.name: region
fields.description: Identification number for Finnish regions. See: https://dvv.fi/tilastot-ja-luettelot, file Maakunnat.xlsx

fields.name: municipality
fields.description: Identification number for Finnish municipalities. See: http://tilastokeskus.fi/meta/luokitukset/kunta/001-2019/index.html

fields.name: street
fields.description: Street name: an identifying name given to a street

fields.name: house_number
fields.description: Unique number to each building in a street or area, with the intention of making it easier to locate a particular building

fields.name: postal_code
fields.description: Series of digits included in a postal address for the purpose of sorting mail.

fields.name: latitude_wgs84
fields.description: Coordinate latitude in the WGS 84 standard. The World Geodetic System (WGS) is a standard for use in cartography, geodesy, and navigation including GPS.

fields.name: longitude_wgs84
fields.description: Coordinate longitude in the WGS 84 standard. The World Geodetic System (WGS) is a standard for use in cartography, geodesy, and navigation including GPS.

fields.name: building_use
fields.description: Intended use of building. The identification codes with the corresponding letter codes from stat.fi are: 0 The intended use of building is lacking, 1 Residental building or business premises (A - H), and 2 Production building or other building (J - N). See: http://www.stat.fi/meta/luokitukset/rakennus/001-2018-07-12/index_en.html
